gp1.small.Description: General purpose small shape with 1 CPUs, 4GB of RAM and 16GB of ephemeral storage

gp1.medium.Description: General purpose medium shape with 2 CPUs, 8GB of RAM and 32GB of ephemeral storage

gp1.large.Description: General purpose large shape with 4 CPUs, 16GB of RAM and 64GB of ephemeral storage

ac1.t4.Description: Accelerated computing shape with 1 16GB T4 GPU, 4 CPUs, 16GB of RAM and 512GB of ephemeral storage

ac1.a10.Description: Accelerated computing shape with 1 24GB A10 GPU, 8 CPUs, 32GB of RAM and 512GB of ephemeral storage

tuna.medium.Description: Medium accelerated computing shape for TUNA
